original_title: IUSF appoints Madushan Chandrajith as its new convenor
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Madhushan Chandrajith has been appointed as the new convener of the Inter-University Students Federation. The appointment was made during an IUSF meeting held at Rajarata University. Madhushan Indrajith is a student of the Faculty of Ecology at the University of Peradeniya.
